 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָנַע‎</span> **verb** ==withhold, hold back== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Zinjirli <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מנע‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Sendsch. 60</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מנע‎</span> [[BDB#Levy|Levy-Os]]<sup>ZMG xix. 1865, 268</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְנַע‎</span>) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Gen.30.2|Gen 30:2]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנָעַ֫נִי‎</span> [[1Sam.25.34|1Sam 25:34]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָנַ֫עְתָּ‎</span> [[Ps.21.3|Ps 21:3]]; [[Neh.9.20|Neh 9:20]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְנַעֿ‎</span> [[Ps.84.12|Ps 84:12]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְנָעֵָ֫נִי‎</span> [[2Sam.13.13|2Sam 13:13]] etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנַע‎</span> [[Prov.1.15|Prov 1:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנְעִי‎</span> [[Jer.2.25|Jer 2:25]]; [[Jer.31.16|Jer 31:16]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹנֵעַ‎</span> [[Prov.11.26|Prov 11:26]]; [[Jer.48.10|Jer 48:10]] — ***withhold***, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> [[Gen.30.2|Gen 30:2]] (object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרִיבֶֿטֶן‎</span>), [[Amos.4.7|Amos 4:7]] (rain), [[Neh.9.20|Neh 9:20]] (manna; all subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>); [[Job.22.7|Job 22:7]] (bread), [[1Kgs.20.7|1Kgs 20:7]] (object omitted; both human subject), so [[Jer.48.10|Jer 48:10]] (sword), [[Eccl.2.10|Eccl 2:10]] (heart), [[Jer.5.25|Jer 5:25]] (good), [[Prov.3.27|Prov 3:27]] (***id.***, [[Prov.1.15|Prov 1:15]] (foot); [[Jer.2.25|Jer 2:25]] (***id.***) [[Jer.31.16|Jer 31:16]] (voice); further, [[2Sam.13.13|2Sam 13:13]] (woman), [[Jer.42.4|Jer 42:4]] (knowledge), [[Job.31.16|Job 31:16]] (poor), [[Prov.23.13|Prov 23:13]] (correction), object omitted <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject [[Prov.30.7|Prov 30:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> omitted [[Prov.11.26|Prov 11:26]] (object corn); compare [[Ps.21.3|Ps 21:3]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> (object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרֶשֶׁת שְׂפָתָיו‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָתַן תַּאֲוַת לֵב‎</span>), [[Job.20.13|Job 20:13]] figurative (wickedness), [[Ezek.31.15|Ezek 31:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject (object rivers); object person <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מן‎</span> [[Num.24.11|Num 24:11]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> + infinitive [[1Sam.25.26|1Sam 25:26]]; [[1Sam.25.34|1Sam 25:34]] followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.84.12|Ps 84:12]] (good). **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִמְנַע‎</span> [[Joel.1.13|Joel 1:13]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמָּנַע‎</span> [[Job.38.15|Job 38:15]], etc.; ***be withholden*** followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִנְחָה‎</span> etc. [[Joel.1.13|Joel 1:13]] light from wicked [[Job.38.15|Job 38:15]]; [[Num.22.16|Num 22:16]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> + infinitive); subject showers (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְבִבִים‎</span>) [[Jer.3.3|Jer 3:3]].
